Faction.name: {=fHnbNu30}Ōtomo-shi
Faction.text: {=A8L5TLZI}One of the dominant clans in Kyushu, the Ōtomo lay claim to swathes of the hilly eastern side of the island. Flourishing port cities along the coast have introduced Christianity and trade to the Ōtomo lands. Thanks to this cooperation with Europe, the Ōtomo clan have gained an upper hand in Japan's technological arms race by bolstering their ranks with imported matchlock weapons. With land reaching from Bungo in the south to Hakata in the north the realm of the Ōtomo is not without contention. The Mouri clan have come from Honshu taking Moji castle and now threatening Ōtomo control of the vital port city of Hakata. With a Mouri foothold now in Kyushu and with Ryūzouji power rising in the west, the Ōtomo must rally under clan daimyo Ōtomo Sorin or risk losing vital land and ports.
